summary: A diffusion pipeline that generates images from text prompts using the Stable Diffusion XL model enhanced with a ControlNet‑XS adapter for additional visual conditioning. It coordinates VAE encoding/decoding, dual CLIP text encoders, tokenization, UNet denoising, scheduling, optional invisible watermarking, and supports loading of textual inversion embeddings, LoRA weights, and checkpoint files.
business_intent: Provide developers, designers, and content creators with a high‑quality, controllable text‑to‑image generation tool for applications such as creative design, advertising, visual content production, and rapid prototyping.
